# vue-image-magnifier

## setup
```
npm install vue-image-magnifier
```

### use
```
import ImageMagnifier from vue-image-magnifier
Vue.use(ImageMagnifier)
//or
import {ImageMagnifier} from vue-image-magnifier
```

### demo
```
npm run demo
```

### live example
> [code open](https://codepen.io/zhoulin/pen/dLOgPP)
